title: BBC Local Live: Birmingham & the Black Country on Tuesday 29 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: blind man has acid squirted in eyes .
villa turn to former fa man bevington .

documents.title: updates on scrapyard fire , plus more news
text: that 's it for live updates .
you can keep up to date on the saltley scrapyard blaze on bbc midlands today at 18:30 and 22:30 .
wm will also have the latest news .
we 'll be back from 08:00 on wednesday with the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for birmingham and the black country .

documents.title: video : latest weather forecast for birmingham & the black country
text: charlie slater has the latest forecast for birmingham and the black country .

documents.title: recycling site fire seen for miles
text: the fire service said crews were working in dangerous conditions .
author: Caroline Gall
BBC News Online

documents.title: britain 's largest 'super jail ' to get bigger
text: five-hundred extra prisoners will be moved to a prison near wolverhampton , which means inmate numbers there will climb to more than 2,000 .
hmp oakwood is already britain 's largest 'super jail ' and will get bigger from july .
we are committed to making best use of our prison estate , in order to properly rehabilitate offenders and maximise value for the taxpayer .
that is why hmp oakwood will soon accommodate additional prisoners to make use of vacant places

documents.title: scrapyard blaze : fire service interview
text: the fire service says it 's too early to say how the fire started at the scrapyard in saltley .
it 's a large fire involving two large piles of recycling around 10 metres in height .
about 50 % of the piles are well alight .
we have platforms and jets in-use trying to put the fires out .
the fire is directly underneath an electric pylon so we 're looking at isolating the electric in the surrounding area later on .
the fire service says it would be at the scene for `` a number of days '' damping down .
still very warm here

documents.title: villa turn to former fa man bevington
text: read more on bbc sport , as aston villa announce they 're working with former fa executive adrian bevington as they continue to rebuild following a disastrous season .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: girl hit in face with rock at erdington house party
text: police are appealing for witnesses and information after a 14-year-old girl was assaulted at a house party in erdington .
author: Royal Sutton Coldfield Observer

documents.title: your photos : recycling plant fire
text: michael rooney emailed bbc news these two photos of the scrapyard fire , taken from a passing train .
the fire happened at emr birmingham , a metal recycling centre .
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: drone footage : scrapyard blaze
text: west midlands fire service 's drone captured this footage .
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: recycling site fire : national grid at the scene
text: there are huge flames and plumes of black smoke coming from the fire , with more engines arriving at the scene every few minutes .
seventeen are now on site - with three raised platforms .
national grid is here because of concerns about a gas main , and there are two rail lines nearby .
the cause of the fire is not yet known and there are no reports of any injuries .
westernpower also on site as electricity pylons engulfed by smoke & flames at major fire on # birmingham scrap yard .
author: Elizabeth Glinka
BBC Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: watch : fight to stop flames from spreading
text: west midlands fire service has sent this footage of the scrapyard blaze .

documents.title: scrapyard fire : no casualties reported
text: more than 100 firefighters are now dealing with a fire at a scrapyard in saltley .
west midlands fire service has told us there are no signs of any casualties .
callers to bbc wm have told us the plumes of smoke can be seen from as far away as cannock .
update : no patients from # saltleyfire .

documents.title: plea for people to stop reporting fire
text: many people have got in touch with us over the past few hours to report the black smoke which can be seen for miles .
the emergency services are urging people to stop reporting the fire , after receiving more than 100 999 calls .

BBC Local Live

text: read more on bbc news about 800 tonnes of metal and plastic on fire at a scrapyard in birmingham .

documents.title: scrapyard fire : bbc reporter at the scene
text: i 've just arrived at the scene of a scrapyard blaze in saltley .
firefighters are hard at work trying to contain the blaze from spreading .
a second aerial platform is now in use to tackle the flames from above .
author: Elizabeth Glinka
BBC Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: scrapyard fire : video taken at the scene
text: an aerial platform , a high volume water pumping unit and drone are at the scene of a scrapyard blaze in birmingham .
the fire service says it 's had more than 20 calls from people reporting the blaze , which can be seen for miles across the city .
the fire service is asking people to avoid the area and close all windows and door if nearby .
the fire service has added a number of photos to its facebook page .
smoke can be seen for miles

documents.title: scrapyard fire : 70-plus firefighters at the scene
text: more than 70 firefighters are now tackling the blaze at a scrapyard in birmingham , west midlands fire service says .
a spokesman for the fire service says 800 tonnes of mixed metal and plastic are on fire at the site on clarel avenue in saltley .
there are currently 12 fire engines at the scene .
update- severe fire at metal recycling centre on clarel avenue # birmingham now 12 fire engines , over 60 firefighters
over twenty 999 calls received by @ twitterid who are also extremely busy managing resources across the brigade .
fire at clarel avenue , # birmingham recycling centre involves around 800 tonnes of mixed-plastic , rubber and metal .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid taken from fox hollies park
@ twitterid view from by the bt tower

documents.title: video : large plumes of smoke
text: large plumes of smoke can be seen from miles away as firefighters tackle a scrapyard blaze .
wm journalist kevin pashby tweeted this video

documents.title: photo : birmingham scrapyard fire
text: the latest photo from the fire service shows the blaze close-up on clarel avenue .
west midlands fire service is advising residents nearby to keep windows and doors closed .
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingfirefighters tackle scrapyard fire in birmingham
text: firefighters are tackling a blaze at a scrapyard in birmingham .
west midlands fire service says it received a 999 call to clarel avenue in saltley at about 14:00 .
i 'm told there are eight fire engines at the scene .
we 'll bring you more details when we have them .
breaking : 6 fire engines + aerial platform attending severe fire at industrial unit on clarel avenue , # birmingham .
if near to clarel avenue in # birmingham , please close windows and doors .
around ten 999 calls received .
update : fire on clarel avenue in # birmingham increased to 8 fire engines and over 40 firefighters .
avoid area .
@ twitterid is there any senior officers in attendance , hope firefighters on scene get the fire under control quickly .
# keepsafe
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: speedway : wolves cancel meeting
text: cradley started the new speedway season with a 51-39 home win over belle vue colts last night .
tonight , wolves ' meeting with belle vue aces has been cancelled .
the club says a poor weather forecast led to the decision and it is `` to minimise the inconvenience for all parties - riders , staff , fans and sponsors '' .
author: Mikey Burrows
BBC WM Sport

documents.title: ukip councillor slams dudley council leader over `` unjustified '' pay rises
text: the leader of the borough 's ukip group has slammed dudley 's council leader for taking what he describes as `` unjustified '' annual pay rises totalling thousands of pounds .
author: Stourbridge News

documents.title: video : wolverhampton bridge replacement
text: network rail used one of the biggest cranes in the uk to install and replace a new canal bridge at wolverhampton .

documents.title: travel : accident on m6 northbound
text: two lanes are closed and there 's queuing traffic on the m6 northbound between j10 , for the a454 ( wolverhampton ) , and j11 , the a460 ( cannock ) , because of an accident .
congestion is to j8 , at the m5 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 500 more inmates at hmp oakwood 'superjail '
text: five hundred extra prisoners will be moved to hmp oakwood with inmate numbers hitting more than 2,000 , it has been revealed .
author: Express and Star

documents.title: pele to appear at cannock sports venue
text: pele - one of the greatest ever footballers - is set to make a sensational appearance at a cannock sports venue
author: Cannock Mercury

documents.title: latest headlines : man in stable condition after drive-by shooting ; ex-fa boss joins villa
text: the top stories for birmingham and the black country this lunchtime include :
- a man remains in a stable condition in hospital after he was shot in the leg in what police believe was a targeted drive-by shooting in handsworth wood .
- police are appealing for information after a blind man was subjected to an acid attack in halesowen
- the former football association executive adrian bevington has taken on a new role at aston villa
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sandwell council leader dies aged 52 : town centre legacy
text: the leader of sandwell council , darren cooper , died suddenly over the easter weekend .
described by some as a `` true son of sandwell '' , darren cooper became a councillor in 1991 and took over as leader in 2009 .
one of his biggest achievements as leader was the revamp of west bromwich town centre .
well thought of in the labour party , he was widely expected to try to become the party 's candidate for a future elected mayor of the west midlands .
the last time i spoke to him a few weeks ago , he told me the idea of such a big job was exciting , but he was still considering what impact it would have on his wife and three children .
author: Rob Mayor
Black Country Political Reporter, BBC WM

documents.title: man shot in leg in 'targeted ' birmingham drive-by shooting
text: police are investigating after a man was shot on a birmingham street in a drive-by shooting .
a shot was fired from a vehicle in handsworth wood just after 05:00 on monday in what west midlands police believe was a targeted attack .
the 27-year-old was wounded in the leg and remains in a stable condition in hospital .

documents.title: birmingham dancer joins mary poppins on tour
text: a dancer from walsall has been to perform in the biggest touring show in europe .
jabari braham ( who trained at the arabesque dance academy in birmingham , is taking part in the uk tour of mary poppins , which runs until january next year .
the show is his first professional musical performance .
author: BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: name change hope for dudley hippodrome
text: campaigners are encouraging the whole black country to get behind the fight to save dudley hippodrome - with plans to potentially re-name the venue .
author: Express and Star

documents.title: ex-fa boss joins aston villa
text: former fa executive adrian bevington is now working with aston villa , the club confirms .
he was the managing director of club england and worked with many managers and coaches during his 17 years at the fa .
more recently he has worked with several clubs and the welsh fa and i 'm convinced his experience , contacts and understanding of football will be a tremendous asset to aston villa football club

documents.title: police appeal for missing walsall teen not seen for almost two weeks
text: police are appealing for the public 's help in finding a missing teenager who has not been seen for nearly two weeks .
author: Walsall Advertiser

documents.title: new railway bridge installed at wolverhampton
text: there were severe delays over the easter break on the railways as major works were carried out .
many trains through wolverhampton were affected this morning as work continued on new tracks and a new bridge being installed .
a rather happy network rail team tweeted
we have completed the new bridge at # wolverhampton two hours ahead of schedule .
take that , storm katie !

documents.title: scale of cuts to libraries unveiled
text: the number of paid staff working in uk libraries has fallen by almost 8,000 since 2010 , as the number of volunteers has soared , a bbc investigation finds .
since 2010 in birmingham , one library and/or mobile library has closed .
also , there were 353 paid staff in libraries , compared with 194 now .
the council had two unpaid volunteers in 2010 and has 46 volunteers today .

documents.title: latest headlines : 80+ young people charged with firearms offences in three years ; vigil held for lahore victims
text: the top stories on tuesday 29 march include :
- more than 80 young people have been charged with firearms offences by west midlands police in the last three years , a freedom of information request shows
- a vigil 's been held in birmingham this evening for the victims of the suicide bomb attack in lahore
- the birmingham bears are due to announce their plans for the new cricket t20 season at edgbaston this evening
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live

documents.title: video : vigil for lahore bomb attack victims held
text: a vigil 's been held in birmingham for the victims of the suicide bomb attack in lahore .

the organisers of the multi-faith event yesterday evening said they wanted to show their solidarity with the people of pakistan after a faction of the taliban attacked families at a playground on easter sunday , killing 70 and injuring scores more .
syed ahmed maroof , consul general of pakistan in birmingham , spoke at the vigil .

documents.title: man sought after blind man targeted in acid attack
text: police would like to speak to this man ( a blind man was targeted in an acid attack .
a 54-year-old was being helped into a car when a man squirted a liquid into his eyes .
author: Express and Star

documents.title: t20 bears announcement expected later
text: the birmingham bears are due to announce their plans for the new cricket t20 season at edgbaston this evening .
the bears lost in the semi-final of the competition last year .
today they 're due to unveil their new kit and reveal plans for two special matches during the tournament which begins in may .

documents.title: more than 80 young people arrested for firearms offences in west midlands
text: our top story this morning : eighty-three young people have been charged with firearms offences by west midlands police in the last three years .
the force says they include an 11-year-old in 2015 , a 12-year-old in 2013 and eight 13-year-old boys .
figures obtained under freedom of information laws by the press association show police have arrested more than 1,500 children in the past three years for suspected gun crimes .
author: BBC WM

documents.title: watch : latest forecast for the west midlands
text: a breezy and chilly feel to the day with variable amounts of cloud .
there will be a mix of some sunny spells and scattered , locally heavy , showers with a risk of hail and thunder , merging at times into longer spells of rain - highs of 10c ( 50f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: good morning : live updates for birmingham and the black country
text: i 'm in the bbc wm newsroom bringing you the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for birmingham and the black country .
if you 'd like to get in touch about any of the updates we 're featuring - email , tweet @ twitterid or get in touch via facebook .
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC Local Live
